curriculum.title: Academic Curriculum
curriculum.description: Our curriculum is designed to foster critical thinking and practical skills, blending the Ugandan National Curriculum with international best practices.

performance.title: Academic Excellence
performance.intro: We consistently rank in the top 10% of schools nationally, with a high percentage of students qualifying for university admission on government merit.
highlights: Best performing school in Nakawa Division for 5 consecutive years.
Produced top students in Mathematics and Sciences nationally.

cocurricular.title: Co-Curricular Activities
cocurricular.intro: Beyond the classroom, we nurture talent through a vibrant array of clubs and sports.

activities.name: Hi Skool Kiromo
activities.desc: Leading vibrant social and cultural events.

items.name: Library Resource Centre
items.desc: Digital library management system with thousands of physical and e-books.

items.name: Science Laboratories
items.desc: Fully equipped Physics, Chemistry, and Biology labs for practical learning.

items.desc: Modern ICT centers with high-speed internet for digital literacy.

items.name: Sports Center
items.desc: Multipurpose courts for basketball, netball, and volleyball.

fees.title: Fees Structure
fees.intro: We strive to provide premium education at a competitive cost. Fees are paid per term.
fees.note: Fees are subject to review by the Board of Governors. Functional fees apply for new students.
